overview: This piece does radical justice to the widely observable tendency of increasingly shorter communication sequences by offering four short films at once, tinged in the aesthetic of a commercial break on TV: Attack the System, a blessing for your enemies; Zabrinor, the ultimate drug for the modern world; We Shall Overcoat, an argument over a revolutionary rainbow; and Evil Man, a study of why bad things happen. (tr)
title: 30 Second Thoughts: Volume One
